website_summaries.verdict: A well constructed bath pillow that comes with  special Konjac sponge that gently exfoliates and deep cleanses skin.
pros: Good for odd-shaped bathtubs, even old clawfoot and jetted tubs
Has contoured shape that helps head rest and is light and supportive
Bath sponge great for cleansing and invigorating
cons: Outside cover could be softer, texture may feel rough to some
May smell musty in between drying times
